PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-03362020-05-18FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act, 2019
PrecisRegulations amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT, 2019 in order to (1) strengthen Canada’s ability to combat money laundering and terrorist activity financing; (2) close important customer due diligence gaps in Canada’s Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorist Financing Regime with respect to designated non-financial businesses and professions and level the playing field across reporting entities; (3) implement measures to respond to recommendations from the Parliamentary Review and the Government of British Columbia commissioned reports; (4) improve Canada’s compliance with international standards; and (5) adopt minor technical changes for clarity and ease of understanding.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0112 Publication Date: 2020-06-10
AttachmentsAttachment
